TopicTitle: Realism Overhaul fuel tanks / engines bug? new parts appear as stock?

Articles.Content: I just installed RO today and I was checking out the new parts and I noticed that most of the new parts were just squished, resized amalgamations of stock parts. I think this is a fallback for when the models are missing? I used CKAN to install RO, and this is my first time using that, so I dunno if I did something wrong? Any help would be good.

im dumb and i forgot to install the rp-1 install thing

Edited December 25, 2021 by KerbalChamp2006
You should probably install the RO parts mods- ROEngines, ROSolar, ROCapsules etc. If you want to use RP-1 too, the express install on CKAN is the quickest and easiest way to set it all up.
